import React,{useState} from 'react' import { countries } from 'countries-list' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Shipping = () => { const navigate=useNavigate() const countriesList=Object.values(countries) const shippingInfo=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('shippingInfo')) || {} const[shippingAddress1,setShippingAddress1]=useState(shippingInfo.shippingAddress1 || '') const[shippingAddress2,setShippingAddress2]=useState(shippingInfo.shippingAddress2 || '') const[city,setCity]=useState(shippingInfo.city || '') const[zip,setZip]=useState(shippingInfo.zip || '') const[country,setCountry]=useState(shippingInfo.country || '') const[phone,setPhone]=useState(shippingInfo.phone || '') return ( <>

Shipping Information

setShippingAddress1(e.target.value)} value={shippingAddress1}/>
setShippingAddress2(e.target.value)} value={shippingAddress2}/>
setCity(e.target.value)} value={city}/>
setZip(e.target.value)} value={zip}/>
setPhone(e.target.value)} value={phone}/>
) } export default Shipping
